p.k: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, Tokyo Summer Story: Season of Remembrance.
p.d: The temperature rises over 30 degrees Celsius almost every day in the summer of Tokyo. But there are many fond memories unique to Tokyo summers. Kids rushing to summer festivals clutching pocket money. Hand-held fireworks have their own charm, as you can enjoy them even in small areas. A Bon dance with a 300-year history in downtown Tokyo. An unchanged landscape of old times inherited in Tokyo, an ever-changing metropolis. We go on a journey to find stories of summer in the big city.
